commands.name: az costmanagement show-operation-result
commands.summary: Get the result of the specified operation. The link with this operationId is provided as a response header of the initial request.
commands.syntax:
az costmanagement show-operation-result --operation-id
                                        --scope
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
